page.description: Properties and methods in the CSS::StyleSheet Class.

property.name: leading_comments
property.description:
Type: "C",
Comments before any of the elements

property.name: item
property.description:
Type: "Array of Selector"
Item array for stylesheet selectors

property.name: media
property.description:
Type: "Array of Media"
Media block for style sheet

methodref.name: Clone
methodref.description: Create a copy of an object instance.

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.

methodref.name: Addmedia
methodref.description: Add a media.

methodref.name: AddscssVariable
methodref.description: Add a scssVariable.

methodref.name: AppendStyleSheet
methodref.description: Add styles to the current style sheet.

methodref.name: ApplyDividerStyles
methodref.description: Add to a specified class border style overrides from another class applied to specified edge (top,left,bottom,right).

methodref.name: CSS3FromLegacy
methodref.description: Set undefined CSS3 features when legacy mozilla Or WebKit attributes.

methodref.name: CSS3StripLegacy
methodref.description: Clear out any legacy mozilla Or WebKit attributes already represented by CSS3 standard attributes in style (unbloat).

methodref.name: CSS3ToLegacy
methodref.description: Represent any CSS3 features as legacy Mozilla and WebKit attributes (bloat).

methodref.name: CollectSameSelectors
methodref.description: Compress selectors that match exactly.

methodref.name: ContainsSass
methodref.description: Returns true if the stylesheet contains SASS patterns.

methodref.name: Deleteitem
methodref.description: Delete a item.

methodref.name: Deletemedia
methodref.description: Delete a media.

methodref.name: DeletescssVariable
methodref.description: Delete a scssVariable.

methodref.name: ExpandBoxStyles
methodref.description: Expands 'box' styles based on root style(s) (if borders are defined) - removes borders from the 'base' style, which will only be kept around if it includes non-border properties.

methodref.name: ExtractStyles
methodref.description: Returns a subset stylesheet based on styles that match selectors in list of patterns.

methodref.name: FindSelector
methodref.description: Returns the index into item[] of the selector that matches the pattern.

methodref.name: FindSelectors
methodref.description: Returns a cr-lf delimited list of selector names that match the pattern.

methodref.name: FlattenSelectors
methodref.description: One class per selector.

methodref.name: FromString
methodref.description: Convert CSS style sheet text to an style definition.

methodref.name: FromStringSCss
methodref.description: Convert SCSS style sheet text to an style definition (handles scss variables etc).

methodref.name: HasCSS3
methodref.description: Returns true if style sheet includes CSS3 attributes.

methodref.name: ImageGenerate
methodref.description: Remove and process @image-generate selectors. input images are read from the provided input folder, outputs images are written to the provided output folder.

methodref.name: Insertitem
methodref.description: Insert a new item.

methodref.name: Insertmedia
methodref.description: Insert a new media.

methodref.name: InsertscssVariable
methodref.description: Insert a new scssVariable.

methodref.name: MergeLikeSelectors
methodref.description: last duplicate selectors overwrite values in later selectors.

methodref.name: Moveitem
methodref.description: Move a block of item items.

methodref.name: Movemedia
methodref.description: Move a block of media items.

methodref.name: MovescssVariable
methodref.description: Move a block of scssVariable items.

methodref.name: Output
methodref.description: Create CSS output & object (with filter and output expression) and process it.

methodref.name: OutputProcess
methodref.description: Process the CSS output (i.e. filter + output combination).

methodref.name: PurgeFirstSelectors
methodref.description: Purge first duplicate selectors.

methodref.name: PurgeLastSelectors
methodref.description: Purge last duplicate selectors.

methodref.name: Selectors
methodref.description: Get a list of selectors.

methodref.name: SelectorsCombine
methodref.description: Returns a styleDef that combines all the attributes from the named selectors (cr-lf delimited list) - any attributes that are NOT common to all will have a value of <Multiple>.

methodref.name: ToString
methodref.description: Output the CSS style sheet text that represents the style sheet definition.

methodref.name: UnFlattenSelectors
methodref.description: Attempt to restore prior selector.
